# m-progress-bar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property                    | Attribute                  | Description                                | Type                  | Default     |
| --------------------------- | -------------------------- | ------------------------------------------ | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `classNameBar`              | `class-name-bar`           | Additional classes for progress bar        | `string \| undefined` | `undefined` |
| `classNameContainer`        | `class-name-container`     | Additional classes for component container | `string \| undefined` | `undefined` |
| `classNameProgress`         | `class-name-progress`      | Additional classes for progress container  | `string \| undefined` | `undefined` |
| `currentValue` _(required)_ | `current-value`            | Current progress-bar value                 | `number`              | `undefined` |
| `enableDarkMode`            | `enable-dark-mode`         | Enable dark mode                           | `boolean`             | `false`     |
| `enableStripedAnimation`    | `enable-striped-animation` | Enable striped animation                   | `boolean`             | `false`     |
| `maxValue`                  | `max-value`                | Maximum value of the bar                   | `number`              | `100`       |
| `minValue`                  | `min-value`                | Minimum value of the bar                   | `number`              | `0`         |
